dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 2004 11:59 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Violation
Date:         Wed, 10 Nov 2004 12:42:56 -0500
From:         Rich Taylor <rich@registeredmedia.com>
Reply-To:         Rich Taylor <rich@registeredmedia.com>
Organization:         RegisteredMedia
To:         <abuse@servermatrix.com>



*Dear Sir/Madame,*
**
*It has come to our attention that a website hosted by  you
(lifeisajoke.com) contains images that are copyrighted by
RegisteredMedia.  The following URL's contain the copyrighted images.*


http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures463_html.htm
Make my day

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures461_html.htm
Weekend in Baghdad

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures462_html.htm
Iraq Edition Game Show (who wants to be a millionaire)

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures470_html.htm
(Iraqi Dinar)

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures453_html.htm
Baghdad Brothers

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures484_html.htm
Saddam Nun

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures485_html.htm
Saddam Caught

http://www.lifeisajoke.com/pictures509_html.htm
Saddam Escape

We would appreciate their immediate removal and notification to the
website owner that copyright violation has occurred and will not be
tolerated.

Thank you,

Rich Taylor
RegisteredMedia.com
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFBklbRvK/XpJs6oyURAg3LAKChJ0OEP8fLuL0ILoNyPjTowCKMNgCglBa+
ZtzFq6hRmAz8VspficZ3w0I=
=XN5f
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
